Example_1.review: I heart King's. I've always been a fan and this one was as good as my old one in Monaca.
Example_1.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong liking for King's and compares it positively to their previous experiences, indicating consistent satisfaction with the restaurant.
key_phrases: as good as my old one

Example_2.review: Love this place. Never had a bad meal. Good portions and great people. Be ready to stand in line.
Example_2.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong positive feelings towards the restaurant, praising the quality of the meals, the portion sizes, and the staff. The mention of a line suggests popularity, which can be seen as a positive, despite the slight inconvenience it might cause.

Example_3.review: Great little place. Treats you like a local.Eaten here 3 times a week for a month. Same overtime. Barb is always here.
Example_3.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment by describing the place as great and appreciating the local treatment. The frequency of visits suggests a high level of satisfaction with the restaurant.

Example_4.review: Far away from real Chinese food. Doesn't even taste good as American style Chinese food.
Example_4.explanation: The speaker values real Chinese food over American style Chinese food, and they believe that the restaurant doesn't measure up to their already lowered expectations of American style Chinese food.

Example_5.review: Papa J's is expensive and inconsistent. The ambiance is nice but it doesn't justify the prices. There are better restaurants in Carnegie.
Example_5.explanation: The reviewer is critical of the restaurant's prices and inconsistency in quality. While they acknowledge a positive aspect, the nice ambiance, it is not enough to outweigh their negative view. They also compare it unfavorably to other restaurants in the area.

Example_6.review: I love this place! The food is always so fresh and delicious. The staff is always friendly, as well.
Example_6.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment with phrases like 'I love this place', 'food is always so fresh and delicious', and 'staff is always friendly', indicating a very positive experience.
key_phrases: food is always so fresh and delicious

Example_7.review: Some of the best chow around--love this place. The bread and salads and soups are great.
Example_7.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the food quality and their affection for the place, indicating a very positive experience.
key_phrases: Some of the best chow around
The bread and salads and soups are great

Example_8.review: The worst dental office I ever been. No one can beat it!!! You should avoid it at any time.
Example_8.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very poor opinion of the dental office.
key_phrases: The worst dental office I ever been
You should avoid it at any time

Example_9.review: Its clean, open 24/7 with hot shoe string fries and creative milkshakes. What else do you want in life??
Example_9.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with multiple aspects of the restaurant, including the cleanliness, hours of operation, fries, and milkshakes. The rhetorical question at the end suggests a high level of satisfaction.

Example_10.review: Had a great time at Sing Sing a while ago with friends. Friendly staff. Will return.
Example_10.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, mentioning a great time and friendly staff, and expresses intent to return, which indicates satisfaction.

Example_11.review: Waterfront Lowe's beats Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden. Hate to admit it, but it's true.
Example_11.explanation: The speaker is comparing two locations and expressing a preference for one over the other specifically for lawn and garden. The use of 'hate to admit it' suggests some reluctance but ultimately concedes that one is better.
key_phrases: beats Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden
Hate to admit it, but it's true

Example_12.review: i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!\nO.. But the bartender Melissa was a SUPER bitch and RUDE \nHope they fire her..
Example_12.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment towards the bartender's behavior, which significantly impacts their overall experience. However, they also mention having fun with the games, indicating some positive aspects.
key_phrases: the bartender Melissa was a SUPER bitch and RUDE
i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!

Example_13.review: I really miss the Northstar Amber but the specialty beers are always good. Food is excellent and the service staff is friendly.
Example_13.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the food and service, and while they miss a particular beer, they still enjoy the specialty beers offered.

Example_14.review: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables. I can see my salad is ready at the window. Worst serves ever.
Example_14.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the service, emphasizing that the servers are not attentive and even labeling it as the worst ever.
key_phrases: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables
I can see my salad is ready at the window

Example_15.review: The food was okay. The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--deafening. Awful acoustics!
Example_15.explanation: The reviewer finds the acoustics to be terrible, which significantly impacts their dining experience. Although they mention the food was okay, the emphasis on the negative experience with the noise overshadows this.
key_phrases: The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--deafening

Example_16.review: The worse \"Chinese food\", even the white rice which came with the ogle sweet and sour chicken is really bad. Please don't eat this food.
Example_16.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very poor opinion of the food quality. They even advise others not to eat there, which suggests a strong negative sentiment.

Example_17.review: This place.. Is ok if ur grabn something quick .. But they do have a great happy hour tho
Example_17.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a neutral opinion about the restaurant's offerings for a quick visit but has a positive view of the happy hour.
key_phrases: ok if ur grabn something quick

Example_18.review: Awful everything. From the bad service, to the diluted soup, to the lame-no chicken on the chicken salad, to the PRE-fabricated pizza. AVOID THIS PLACE!
Example_18.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language throughout the review, indicating a very poor experience with multiple aspects of the restaurant.

Example_19.review: Food was ok had a steak w/ shrimp side Ass mashed potatoes. Everything was ok not a lot of flavor.
Example_19.explanation: The reviewer finds the food to be just 'ok,' indicating a lack of enthusiasm. The specific mention of 'not a lot of flavor' suggests disappointment in the taste of the food.

Example_20.review: Love the stores selection but HATE how the girls chase you around to tell you their sales. If I wanted to know I'd ask !!!
Example_20.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong dislike for the aggressive sales tactics but also shows appreciation for the store's selection. The positive sentiment towards the selection is overshadowed by the negative sentiment towards the staff's behavior.
key_phrases: HATE how the girls chase you around
If I wanted to know I'd ask

Example_21.review: This store has such bad service. The service staff are rude rude rude. Save your money, shop elsewhere.
Example_21.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the rudeness of the service staff and suggests that the service is bad enough to warrant shopping elsewhere.
key_phrases: service staff are rude rude rude

Example_22.review: They make a nice breakfast for less than the tip form dinner the night before. That's not bad!
Example_22.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the value for money, indicating that the breakfast was good and comparatively inexpensive.
key_phrases: less than the tip form dinner the night before

Example_23.review:
A very nice meal in a very nice restaurant

PROS:
Very good food
interesting choices--not your typical red lobster crap
Great service
Very clean (restrooms, included)

CONS:
n/a
Example_23.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the food quality, service, and cleanliness of the restaurant. The mention of 'interesting choices' suggests a positive view on the menu variety, and the comparison to 'typical red lobster crap' implies a higher standard of dining experience.

Example_24.review: Service an atmosphere was great. I had the shrimp boil and it was very under-seasoned. Much closer to bland than anything.
Example_24.explanation: The positive comment about the service and atmosphere is outweighed by the negative sentiment regarding the main dish, the shrimp boil, which the reviewer found very under-seasoned and bland.

Example_25.review: Good pizza and i love the breadsticks...i don't know too much else about this place
Example_25.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiments about the food they did try, specifically the pizza and breadsticks. The lack of further knowledge about the restaurant does not detract from their positive dining experience.

Example_26.review: Great service, friendly staff, great food, great prices. What more can you ask for in a small town breakfast place? Will definitely be back
Example_26.explanation: The reviewer is very satisfied with multiple aspects of the restaurant, including service, staff, food, and prices. They also express a clear intention to return, which indicates a high level of satisfaction.
key_phrases: Great service, friendly staff, great food, great prices
What more can you ask for

Example_27.review: A great little place. Delicious and affordable Italian food. Great salads and pasta. Try the pizza rolls!
Example_27.explanation: The reviewer uses positive adjectives such as 'delicious', 'affordable', and 'great' to describe the food and the place. They also make a recommendation, which implies a positive experience.

Example_28.review: Horrifying. This place should be ashamed of itself. DO NOT STAY HERE. Beyond dirty, just absolutely rank.
Example_28.explanation: The use of strong negative language such as 'Horrifying', 'ashamed', 'Beyond dirty', and 'absolutely rank' indicates a very negative experience. The imperative 'DO NOT STAY HERE' reinforces the negative sentiment.

Example_29.review: Cookies aren't bad. Haven't had a reason to buy cakes or other pastries. Staff is friendly and it smells like heaven.
Example_29.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a positive experience with the staff and the ambiance of the place, indicated by the friendly staff and pleasant smell. The comment on the cookies being 'not bad' suggests a neutral to slightly positive sentiment towards the food.

Example_30.review: Prices not great for true thrifters. Staff completely useless. No dressing rooms. I simply have nothing to say about this place.
Example_30.explanation: The reviewer expresses dissatisfaction with the staff and prices, which are significant aspects of a shopping experience. The lack of dressing rooms is also a negative point. The overall tone is negative, indicating a poor experience.
key_phrases: Prices not great for true thrifters

Example_31.review: First time here and I wasnt impressed at all! I should have gone to the dairy queen :-(
Example_31.explanation: The reviewer indicates a strong negative experience by stating they were not impressed at all, suggesting that even a fast-food chain like Dairy Queen would have been a better choice. The use of a sad emoticon further emphasizes their disappointment.
key_phrases: should have gone to the dairy queen

Example_32.review: There was absolutely nothing not to like. Reasonably priced wines, home style Italian cooking. Great upbeat ambience.
Example_32.explanation: The reviewer expresses complete satisfaction with the restaurant, highlighting the lack of negatives, the value of the wines, the quality of the cooking, and the positive atmosphere.

Example_33.review: Tasteless food that arrived over an hour after it was ordered and was cold. Will never order from here again.
Example_33.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the food's lack of flavor, the excessive delivery time, and the food's temperature upon arrival. The statement about not ordering again indicates a very negative experience.
key_phrases: arrived over an hour after it was ordered

Example_34.review: Minutello's is going out of business. Last day of operation is Sunday, February 17, 2013.
Example_34.explanation: The review is stating a fact about the business closing rather than expressing a sentiment about the quality of the restaurant or the experience.

Example_35.review: I love tazza.. Their coffees are excellent and its a great place to enjoy a relaxing evening..I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies..
Example_35.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by using words like 'love' and 'excellent' to describe their overall experience and specific items such as coffees, Baklawa, sandwiches, and brownies. The mention of it being a 'great place to enjoy a relaxing evening' adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: great place to enjoy a relaxing evening
I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies

Example_36.review: Best coffee in Pittsburgh, without a doubt. Believe the hype. I've been going here for years, and every visit is a pleasure.
Example_36.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive opinion, stating it's the best coffee in the city and endorsing the positive reputation of the place. They also mention a long-term positive experience with every visit.

Example_37.review: This is where I learned what good espresso tastes like. If you make it to Highland Park, stop there and get some great neighborhood atmosphere.
Example_37.explanation: The reviewer positively highlights the quality of the espresso and the atmosphere of the neighborhood, suggesting a good experience and recommending others to visit.

Example_38.review: Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states... I'd say this is the best cappuccino I've had since Italy.
Example_38.explanation: The reviewer expresses difficulty in finding good coffee in the states, which sets a negative tone initially. However, they follow up with high praise for the cappuccino, comparing it favorably to those in Italy, which is known for its coffee.
key_phrases: best cappuccino I've had since Italy
Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states

Example_39.review: I wish we had a way to hold this corporation accountable for its crimes against our society.
Example_39.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language indicating a deep dissatisfaction with the corporation's impact on society. The use of the word 'crimes' suggests a very serious level of wrongdoing.
key_phrases: I wish we had a way

Example_40.review: Great club/bar/lounge/venue. Great mix of people and music with decent bartenders and good prices on beer.
Example_40.explanation: The reviewer uses the word 'great' multiple times, indicating a strong positive sentiment. They appreciate the mix of people and music, the quality of service from the bartenders, and the pricing of the beer.
key_phrases: Great mix of people and music

Example_41.review: Absolutely amazing! Great staff and service! Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down. Good work guys!
Example_41.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'absolutely amazing' and 'best' to describe their experience. They also compliment the staff, service, and music, which are all positive indicators of their satisfaction.
key_phrases: Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down.

Example_42.review: Waiting 20 minutes to get one piece of wood cut in an empty store on a Friday afternoon. Priceless!
Example_42.explanation: The use of 'Priceless!' is likely sarcastic, indicating frustration with the wait time, especially given the store was empty. Waiting 20 minutes for a simple task in an empty store suggests a negative experience.

Example_43.review: I like the pizza and the selection of toppings. They are reliable. Great option for take out food.
Example_43.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear positive sentiment towards the pizza and its selection of toppings. The use of 'like' indicates satisfaction, and describing the restaurant as 'reliable' and a 'Great option for take out food' reinforces the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Great option for take out food

Example_44.review:
Short and sweet, and as a Haiku.

Parking is awful
No wine, but that's PA's fault
Best organic food
Example_44.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear positive sentiment about the quality of the food, which is often the most important aspect of a restaurant review. The negative comments about parking and the lack of wine are attributed to external factors rather than the restaurant itself.
key_phrases: No wine, but that's PA's fault

Example_45.review: Parking is tough, the food selection is great, and if you call ahead they will set aside awesome moving boxes for you.
Example_45.explanation: The reviewer has a positive view of the food selection and appreciates the additional service of setting aside moving boxes. The difficulty with parking is a minor inconvenience in comparison to the positives.
key_phrases: will set aside awesome moving boxes for you

Example_46.review: Great stuff here...The cheese plates are great and always changing. Awesome staff, and the menu offers an nice variety!!\n\nAsk for Tim for your waiter!
Example_46.explanation: The reviewer uses positive language such as 'great' and 'awesome' to describe their experience. They also appreciate the changing variety of cheese plates and the variety offered in the menu. A specific recommendation for a waiter suggests a very positive personal experience.

Example_47.review: Very tasty food and drinks! Its a little pricey, but worth it if you want something better than a typical chain.
Example_47.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiment about the taste of the food and drinks and believes the higher price is justified by the quality, which they perceive as better than what is offered by typical chains.

Example_48.review: pretty good veggie food. I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here. French toast, tofu scramble, museli, salads, sandwiches, lasagna. They have a pretty decent variety.
Example_48.explanation: The reviewer has had multiple meals at the restaurant and mentions a variety of dishes they have tried, indicating a positive experience. The use of 'pretty good' and 'pretty decent' suggests satisfaction but not overwhelming enthusiasm.
key_phrases: I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here

Example_49.review: My favorite for Pt. Breeze/Pittsburgh East End. Flat New York style, not greasy, timely delivery, they know my orders!
Example_49.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear preference for this restaurant, indicating it is their favorite in the area. Positive attributes such as the style of the food, lack of greasiness, and timely delivery contribute to a positive experience. Additionally, the personal touch of the restaurant knowing their orders adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Flat New York style, not greasy

Example_50.review: Got the rancho and the Greek, not so bad but I probably won't go back... Too heavy for me...
Example_50.explanation: The reviewer indicates a negative experience by stating they probably won't return, which suggests dissatisfaction. However, they also mention the food was 'not so bad', indicating some level of acceptance but ultimately overshadowed by the negative aspects.

Example_51.review: Kind of small, but I've had excellent luck with produce here: fresh and organic. In-store coffee bar is a nice plus.
Example_51.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges a minor drawback with the size of the place but has had positive experiences with the quality of the produce and appreciates the additional feature of an in-store coffee bar.
key_phrases: In-store coffee bar is a nice plus

Example_52.review: Don't go. I got more problems and sounds on my car after I spent $800 there. unbelievable!
Example_52.explanation: The imperative 'Don't go' indicates a strong negative sentiment. The customer experienced additional problems with their car after spending a significant amount of money, which adds to the negative experience.

Example_53.review: Get a Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top - absolutely amazing!
Example_53.explanation: The speaker is highly recommending a specific item on the menu, which they found to be absolutely amazing, indicating a very positive experience.
key_phrases: Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top

Example_54.review: I have had lots of items off of their large menu and everything has been good.
Example_54.explanation: The reviewer has tried many items and has had a positive experience with all of them. The mention of a 'large menu' suggests variety and choice, which is typically seen as a positive aspect.

Example_56.review: Horrible - they use chicken that's been out uncover all day . And they smoke around the food.:(
Example_56.explanation: The use of the word 'Horrible' indicates a very strong negative sentiment. The reviewer's concerns about food safety and hygiene, such as chicken being left out and smoking around the food, suggest serious dissatisfaction.
key_phrases: chicken that's been out uncover all day

Example_57.review: Incredible Italian food. Mushroom appetizer is just phenomenal. So is the mozzarella cheese. Great fish. Expensive but worth it!
Example_57.explanation: The reviewer uses strong positive language such as 'incredible' and 'phenomenal' to describe the food, and despite the high cost, they believe it is 'worth it'.

Example_58.review: good food, we had the bean appetizer, seafood diablo, and the flounder...It is expensive but well worth the money, classic.
Example_58.explanation: The reviewer mentions that the food is good and specifies dishes they had, indicating a positive experience. They acknowledge the high price but feel that the quality of the food justifies the cost, which is further emphasized by the term 'classic,' suggesting a high standard.

Example_60.review: Real german food (sausage, etc) and decent beer in family friendly atmosphere.\n\nThis is one of the good joints.
Example_60.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the authenticity of the food, the quality of the beer, and the atmosphere of the restaurant. The phrase 'one of the good joints' indicates a positive experience.

Example_61.review: I must of been eating at another Max's in a pararell universe!\n\nFood was terriable, service was worse! Went and got Sushi!
Example_61.explanation: The reviewer uses hyperbole to express their dissatisfaction with both the food and service, indicating a very negative experience. The mention of going to get sushi elsewhere suggests a complete rejection of the dining experience at Max's.

Example_62.review: A Pittsburgh tradition. Try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel (of course) for dessert. Yum
Example_62.explanation: The use of 'Yum' indicates a positive experience. The recommendation to try specific dishes suggests satisfaction with the food. The reference to 'A Pittsburgh tradition' implies a positive cultural or local appreciation.
key_phrases: Try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel

Example_63.review: This is americanized German food. For real German food, go to Hofbrauhaus and ask for a schnitzel.
Example_63.explanation: The reviewer is indicating a preference for authenticity and suggests another location for what they consider real German food. The use of 'americanized' implies a deviation from authenticity, which is not presented positively.

Example_64.review:
The old arcade game was excellent and only a few quarters to play.
Drinks nice enough .
Bartenders were really nice.
 NIce enough place.
Example_64.explanation: The reviewer seems to have had a positive experience, highlighting the quality of the arcade game and the friendliness of the bartenders. The drinks being 'nice enough' and the overall assessment of the place being 'nice enough' suggest satisfaction without being overly enthusiastic.
key_phrases: The old arcade game was excellent

Example_65.review: You really need to try's this place. Great sandwiches, a hot dog/sausage cart, and friendly service!
Example_65.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about recommending the restaurant, praising the quality of the sandwiches and the friendliness of the service. The mention of a hot dog/sausage cart adds to the positive experience.

Example_66.review: Estimated delivery time 45 minutes actually delivery time 120 minutes.\n\nPizza Hut , a pizza of last resort.
Example_66.explanation: The significant delay in delivery is a major point of dissatisfaction, and the phrase 'a pizza of last resort' suggests that the speaker sees Pizza Hut as an undesirable option, only to be considered when there are no other choices.

Example_67.review: It wasn't as horrid as the reviews would lead you to think. Just don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart and you will be fine.
Example_67.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations due to negative reviews but found the experience better than anticipated. The advice to adjust expectations suggests a moderate satisfaction with the experience.
key_phrases: wasn't as horrid as the reviews
Just don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart

Example_68.review: Awesome spot to grab a dog for a buck. Nothing fancy, must standard ingredients and friendly service.
Example_68.explanation: The reviewer seems pleased with the value and service, using 'awesome' to describe the spot and noting the friendliness of the service. The mention of 'nothing fancy' suggests a level of satisfaction with the simplicity and price.
key_phrases: grab a dog for a buck

Example_69.review: This place is amazing from top to bottom. 2 hours down we are still here.
Example_69.explanation: The reviewer uses strong positive language ('amazing', 'from top to bottom') indicating a very positive experience. The fact that they have stayed for a long time ('2 hours down we are still here') suggests they are enjoying their time and are not in a hurry to leave.
key_phrases: 2 hours down we are still here

Example_70.review: The Steelers are the coolest team in football. They have the best colors, city, history, most fans, etc. \n\nAnd they pretty much dominate.
Example_70.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of enthusiasm and support for the Steelers, mentioning several positive aspects such as being the coolest, having the best attributes, and dominating.
key_phrases: best colors, city, history, most fans

Example_71.review:
A ring for each finger and a sixth for my... 

other hand! 

You're dirty!

Go Steelers!!!
Example_71.explanation: The review does not contain any relevant information about the restaurant's food, service, or atmosphere. It seems to be an unrelated comment about a sports team.

Example_72.review: It's cathartic to give this sorry organization 1 star.\n\nNote: this is a review of the baseball club, not the stadium in which they play
Example_72.explanation: The use of the word 'cathartic' suggests deep dissatisfaction, and the phrase 'sorry organization' indicates a strong negative sentiment towards the entity being reviewed.
key_phrases: cathartic to give this sorry organization 1 star

Example_73.review: Go Pirates!!! That's all I can say. They've made me love baseball and Pittsburgh again. They're only going to get better.
Example_73.explanation: The reviewer expresses a renewed love for baseball and Pittsburgh, which is a strong positive sentiment. The anticipation of improvement also reflects a positive outlook.
key_phrases: They've made me love baseball and Pittsburgh again
They're only going to get better

Example_74.review: Very disappointed. Delivery was late, our gyros were cold and fries were soggy. I wont be ordering from here again.
Example_74.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with both the delivery service and the quality of the food. The use of 'very' emphasizes the extent of their disappointment.
key_phrases: gyros were cold and fries were soggy

Example_75.review: Standard Pittsburgh dive. They had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap and basketball on the television so no complaints.
Example_75.explanation: The reviewer seems satisfied with the beer selection and the availability of sports entertainment. The term 'Standard Pittsburgh dive' might imply a lack of uniqueness, but it does not necessarily carry a negative connotation.
key_phrases: They had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap

Example_76.review: Good coffee, nice walking street, good selection of teas and little gifty things, good pastries, *excellent* scones, and it's not that other green-logo'd coffee place.
Example_76.explanation: The use of 'excellent' to describe the scones indicates a very positive experience. The repetition of 'good' for coffee, selection of teas, and pastries adds to the positive sentiment. The mention of a 'nice walking street' and a preference over another well-known coffee place suggests additional positive aspects.
key_phrases: good selection of teas and little gifty things

Example_77.review: Nice neighborhood coffee. Small but always seems to have room. Good selection of teas also.. Good scones and pastries. CT dos have some specialty blends.
Example_77.explanation: The reviewer mentions several positive aspects of the coffee shop, including the selection of teas, the quality of scones and pastries, and the atmosphere of the neighborhood coffee shop. The mention of 'small but always seems to have room' suggests a cozy, accommodating space.

Example_78.review:
First, I love CTR's coffee.
Second, this location has great batistas and it's less congested than other CTR'S I've been to. 

That about covers it
Example_78.explanation: The reviewer expresses love for the coffee, compliments the baristas, and appreciates the less congested location, which all indicate a positive experience.

Example_79.review: sushi was dry and unenjoyable. the place itself is clean and the decor was minimal. I was not a fan and probably won't be back.
Example_79.explanation: The primary focus of the review is the quality of the sushi, which is described negatively. The cleanliness and decor are mentioned in a neutral to slightly positive light, but they are overshadowed by the negative dining experience.
key_phrases: I was not a fan and probably won't be back
the place itself is clean and the decor was minimal

Example_80.review: Pool hall and pretty crappy bar. Not much else to write home about. Was not a fan and won't be back here.
Example_80.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the bar and expresses a clear lack of interest in returning, indicating a strong negative experience.
key_phrases: Not much else to write home about

Example_81.review: One of the best pastries I've had in my life I got here. I think it's called a \"French bearclaw.\"
Example_81.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very high level of satisfaction with the pastry, referring to it as one of the best they've had in their life. The specific mention of the 'French bearclaw' indicates a positive experience with a particular item.
key_phrases: One of the best pastries I've had in my life

Example_82.review: Sorry, but our pizza was cold. All nine cuts of it. And the garlic wings didn't taste like garlic. Maybe it was an off night?
Example_82.explanation: Receiving cold pizza is generally a negative experience, and the wings not tasting as expected adds to the disappointment. However, the speaker seems to give the benefit of the doubt by suggesting it might have been an off night.
key_phrases: garlic wings didn't taste like garlic
Maybe it was an off night?

Example_83.review: Didn't live up to my expectations at all. Waste of time and money. Sloooooow service.
Example_83.explanation: The reviewer had expectations that were not met, indicating a negative experience. The phrases 'waste of time and money' and 'sloooooow service' strongly suggest dissatisfaction.
key_phrases: Didn't live up to my expectations at all

Example_84.review: Mediocre and poorly made! You can get better quality food from Mcdonalds don't waste your time or money
Example_84.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, comparing the restaurant unfavorably to a fast-food chain known for convenience rather than quality.
key_phrases: don't waste your time or money

Example_85.review: Draft selections are good...service is lousy...food is sub par. Not in a hurry to return.
Example_85.explanation: The positive note about the draft selections is overshadowed by the negative comments about the food and service, which are critical aspects of a restaurant experience. The lack of desire to return indicates a generally negative experience.
key_phrases: Not in a hurry to return

Example_86.review: Good local bar with lots of TVs, good draft selection, and better than average bar food. Definitely a step up from the Saloon.
Example_86.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the quality of the bar food, which they consider better than average. They also value the selection of drafts and the number of TVs, which enhances the bar experience. The comparison to the Saloon suggests this bar is superior.

Example_87.review: Great food and very reasonable prices.  Really enjoy the sandwich and big orders of tasty fries.
Example_87.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the quality of the food, the pricing, and specific menu items like the sandwich and fries.

Example_88.review: Great food and atmosphere. Sweet potato waffle fries are the best. Great for Pirate games.

Example_89.review: The wings here are fantastic and the cheese sticks are absurd in a very good way. Will definitely be back.

The intent to return to the restaurant reinforces the positive sentiment.

Example_90.review: Been here twice. Hate to say it but nothing special. The usual breakfast items but nothing stands out either in preparation or presentation.

The use of 'nothing special' and 'nothing stands out' suggests a lack of uniqueness or excellence in the food. The phrase 'usual breakfast items' implies that the offerings are common and not noteworthy. The preface 'Hate to say it' indicates a reluctance to leave a negative review, suggesting the reviewer might have hoped for a better experience.

Example_91.review: Don't go for healthy, go for tasty comfort food. Great pancakes. Expect a long wait on weekends!

Example_92.review: Excellent breakfast. Regular pancakes rocked. Staff was super and we were seated immediately on a Saturday. So lucky. My first 5 star rating on Yelp.

Example_93.review: Food here is absolutely wonderful! Service is good and people are better. Take my family there and am extremely satisfied.

Example_94.review: I had the Italian jombot here it was so good, and the service was awesome!!! I will definitely be back.

Example_95.review: Pancakes, pancakes, pancakes. Everybody told me I HAD to try and their pancakes.\nWell, the short stack they served me were lousy pancakes.

Example_96.review: Great pie...I could eat a whole large though...if you like a thin crust, you will love this
Example_96.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment by describing the pie as 'great' and suggesting that those who enjoy thin crust will love it. The mention of being able to eat a whole large pie indicates a high level of enjoyment.

Example_97.review: Consistent and quality. Although it might be a love it or hate it thing. I love it, so there ya go.

Example_101.review: Yum! Great little find just outside of the city....especially if you are Chicago dog fan

Example_102.review: I don't come here to eat much, I usually come for the beer cave. Best build-your-own six pack joint in the city!

Example_103.review: Employees are awesome. Everyone is super friendly and they always have kick ass old school jams playing!

Example_104.review: Mac n cheese dog is incredible. This place is small and gets packed so be prepared for a long wait and no personal space.

Example_105.review: The drive through service here leaves something to be desired. Not only was my order wrong but the lady was very grumpy.

Example_106.review: Worst service. Dirty. Slow. Ignorant by the strictest definition. Do not go here. Bad! Real bad.

Example_107.review: Passable, cheap Chinese food. I like the Kung Pao chicken, but they definitely put in too many carrots.

Example_112.review: The worst pulled pork sandwich I have ever had. Their watermelon mixed drink was very good though. I won't be returning.

Bar next to stadium

bar next to stadium place

Example_139.review: Not bad. Not great. But not bad.  Excellent bang for your buck, especially if you're hungry.

Example_142.review: Great food, fast service and the price is right. Perfect stop for a quick lunch in the downtown area.

Example_144.review: This place has amazing homemade crab bisque soup! My turkey sandwich was good too. Quick and loved the friendly staff.

Example_146.review: Spag Warehouse is the best value for money in the tri-state area.... damn good food!!

Example_147.review: Service is lacking and food is mediocre. When I crave Italian this is not the first place I think of.

Example_252.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, focusing on the poor quality of service rather than the food itself. The intensity of the phrases suggests a very negative sentiment.

Example_253.review: Great place. I had a birthday dinner last week. The food and service was great. Friendly staff .. Very pleased.
Example_253.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the food and service, and compliments the staff and the overall experience at the restaurant.
key_phrases: The food and service was great

Example_254.review: Good, honest food, at a fair price, made by cheerful folk. I've been going there for years, and am rarely disappointed.
Example_254.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the quality of the food, the price, and the service. The use of 'good, honest food' and 'cheerful folk' indicates a positive experience, and the long-term patronage and rarity of disappointment suggest consistent satisfaction.

Example_255.review: Jersey Mike's Tuesday Special is awesome. $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink. It's usually the only day that I drink soda.
Example_255.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the value of the Tuesday Special and seems to have a positive experience with it, suggesting they find it to be a good deal.
key_phrases: $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink
It's usually the only day that I drink soda

Example_256.review: Excellent service!! Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers!! Food was excellent, chocolate Sauce was scrumptious !! The creme br\u00fbl\u00e9e is amazing!!
Example_256.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the quality of the food and the service they received, using multiple exclamation marks and superlatives such as 'excellent' and 'amazing'.

Example_257.review: Good food and flavor. Cold greeting at hostess desk. Service good. I would go back.
Example_257.explanation: The positive comments about the food and service suggest a generally good experience, despite the initial cold greeting. The intention to return to the restaurant indicates an overall positive sentiment.

Example_258.review: Had shrimp and grits for lunch. Was not expecting much having lived on the Gulf Coast but was pleasantly surprised.
Example_258.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations due to their experience with Gulf Coast cuisine but ended up having a positive experience at the restaurant.

Example_259.review: Dinner food is high quality/fresh and the recipes are interesting.\n\nFresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus.
Example_259.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the high quality and freshness of the dinner food, finds the recipes interesting, and considers the fresh pear butter and biscuits as a positive addition to their dining experience.
key_phrases: Fresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus

Example_260.review: Fish and chips were great. People should not come here for lunch and discuss business. Enjoy your meal as if it were your last.
Example_260.explanation: The reviewer seems to have enjoyed the fish and chips, which is a positive sentiment towards the food. However, the comment about not discussing business during lunch suggests a negative sentiment towards the atmosphere or the appropriateness of the restaurant for certain activities. The final phrase implies a recommendation to savor the meal, which could be seen as positive.
key_phrases: People should not come here for lunch and discuss business
Enjoy your meal as if it were your last

Example_261.review: First and last to this club. Very pricy,poor service and no contact dance. ... Other clubs in charlotte are better ... Very disappointed .....
Example_261.explanation: The reviewer had multiple complaints about the club, including the high prices, poor service, and lack of expected entertainment. They also compared it negatively to other clubs in the area.

Example_262.review: Great place. Excellent experience. Had the scallops for my main dish. Amazing! If I could give this place 10 stars, I would.
Example_262.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'Great', 'Excellent', and 'Amazing' to describe their experience and the main dish they had. The enthusiasm is further emphasized by the hypothetical willingness to give a rating beyond the maximum.

Example_263.review: We had a wonderful, authentic Italian meal on New Year,s Eve. The service was friendly, I rushed. Can't wait to return!
Example_263.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with both the food and the service, and is eager to return, which indicates a high level of satisfaction.

Example_264.review: I can't think of anything due to my food coma but it was all five stars! The blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish.
Example_264.explanation: The reviewer is extremely satisfied with their experience, to the point of being in a 'food coma,' which is often used to describe a state of contentment after eating a large, satisfying meal. The mention of 'all five stars' indicates a high level of satisfaction, and the 'blackberry sorbet' comment suggests a particularly enjoyable end to the meal.
key_phrases: blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish

Example_265.review: Nice hotel, nice warm cookies! I have stayed at this one twice and would recommend to out of towners.
Example_265.explanation: The reviewer has a positive experience, mentioning the quality of the hotel and the cookies. They also indicate a repeat visit and willingness to recommend the hotel to others.

Example_266.review: Average pizza at best and sub-par appetizers. Decent beer specials are only upside. Walk across the street and eat at Fuel for some real pizza.
Example_266.explanation: The reviewer is clearly disappointed with the food quality, describing the pizza as 'average at best' and the appetizers as 'sub-par'. However, they acknowledge that there are 'decent beer specials', which is a small positive in an otherwise negative review. The suggestion to eat elsewhere for 'real pizza' indicates a strong negative sentiment towards the restaurant's offerings.
key_phrases: Decent beer specials are only upside

Example_267.review: Really. Good. Pizza. Great variety of beer and wine. If you are in downtown, and want a good meal, eat here.
Example_267.explanation: The use of the word 'Really' with 'Good. Pizza.' emphasizes a strong positive sentiment. The mention of a 'Great variety of beer and wine' adds to the positive experience. The recommendation to eat here if one wants a 'good meal' suggests a high level of satisfaction with the dining experience.
key_phrases: Great variety of beer and wine
want a good meal, eat here

Example_268.review: Jerk chicken pizza was excellent. Bomber was good but the fresh oregano over powered everything else. Great beer selection. Service was good.
Example_268.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the jerk chicken pizza and the beer selection, which are significant aspects of a dining experience. The service also receives a positive mention. The only minor criticism is about the balance of flavors in the bomber, but it is still described as good.

Example_269.review: Sorry- just doesn't do it for me. The steak is average and it's over run by BoA middle management.
Example_269.explanation: The reviewer apologizes before stating their opinion, which suggests a negative sentiment. The steak being described as 'average' indicates a lack of enthusiasm or disappointment. The mention of being 'over run by BoA middle management' suggests a negative experience with the atmosphere or clientele.
key_phrases: over run by BoA middle management
Sorry- just doesn't do it for me

Example_270.review: This is a classic steak house. Good service and great food. Go ahead- spend the extra money. It's worth it.
Example_270.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the quality of the food and service, suggesting that the experience justifies a higher price.

Example_271.review: One of the best Steakhouses, always consistent. Great food and service. You can people watch at the bar
Example_271.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the quality of the steakhouse, its consistency, and the quality of both food and service. The additional comment about people watching at the bar adds a positive note about the atmosphere.

Example_272.review: This is heaven for steak lovers like me! High quality and moody...I enjoyed my time very well.
Example_272.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive sentiment, indicating that steak lovers would find the place ideal. The mention of 'high quality' suggests satisfaction with the food, and 'enjoyed my time very well' indicates a positive overall experience.

Example_273.review: Nice antiquey (if thats a word) atmosphere, tons of tv's and a huge bar. Would visit again!
Example_273.explanation: The reviewer seems to appreciate the atmosphere and amenities of the restaurant, and the intent to revisit indicates a positive experience.
key_phrases: tons of tv's and a huge bar

Example_274.review: Just another liberal bias rag.  It's only redeeming use, is for lining bird cages and starting fires.
Example_274.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the restaurant, indicating a very negative sentiment. The phrase 'liberal bias rag' suggests a deep dissatisfaction with the establishment's perceived political stance, and the comment about its 'only redeeming use' being for 'lining bird cages and starting fires' is highly critical and dismissive.
key_phrases: lining bird cages and starting fires

Example_275.review: Average bar with a nice outdoor area. You can go cornholing there which is fun.\n\nWish the beer selection was better.
Example_275.explanation: The reviewer finds the bar to be average, which suggests a neutral sentiment. They express a desire for a better beer selection, which is a negative point, but also mention a positive aspect with the nice outdoor area and the availability of a fun activity.
key_phrases: Wish the beer selection was better

Example_276.review: Go sit at the Bar. The drinks are great and the SUSHI is very good. The women in there are smokin hot.
Example_276.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the quality of the sushi and drinks, which are central to their dining experience. The comment about the women is not directly related to the food or service quality, but it contributes to the reviewer's positive experience.
key_phrases: women in there are smokin hot

Example_277.review: Great place to salsa dance on a Saturday night!! A brief lesson is given by some great professionals-check it out!!
Example_277.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the salsa dancing and the quality of the lesson provided by professionals, suggesting a positive experience.
key_phrases: brief lesson is given by some great professionals

Example_278.review: Convenient parking and great exhibit - Body Worlds. The IMAX is wonderful - beware lots of kids everywhere!
Example_278.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiments about the exhibit, the IMAX, and the convenience of parking. The caution about kids is not necessarily negative, but more of a heads-up to other patrons.

Example_279.review: It reminded me of the dirty restroom at the gas station on HWY 40 driving through Texas. Dirty and nasty.
Example_279.explanation: The reviewer is making a strong negative comparison to a dirty restroom, which suggests a very poor experience.

Example_280.review: Disgusting, slow and pathetic. Takes phone orders before the people standing in front of them. Food is subpar. Skip unless starving
Example_280.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a high level of dissatisfaction with both the service and the food quality.
key_phrases: Takes phone orders before the people standing in front of them

Example_281.review: Nice, friendly staff. WIsh they had what I had come in for. Carmex anyone? I thought it was a regular staple at any drugstore....
Example_281.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the staff, indicating good customer service, but their primary need was not met as the product they were looking for was not available.
key_phrases: Wish they had what I had come in for

Example_282.review: Solid hotel, pretty hard beds but clean. Great water pressure and fantastic location. Be sure to join their club for free in room wifi.
Example_282.explanation: The reviewer gives a balanced view of the hotel, noting both positive aspects such as the location and water pressure, and a negative aspect regarding the bed comfort. The suggestion to join the club for free wifi indicates a helpful tip, which suggests a positive experience overall.
key_phrases: Great water pressure and fantastic location
join their club for free in room wifi

Example_283.review: We had our company holiday party here and it was an AMAZING time! Great atmosphere and all of the catering staff were courteous and helpful.
Example_283.explanation: The reviewer had a very positive experience, emphasizing the quality of the time they had ('AMAZING time'), the ambiance ('Great atmosphere'), and the service ('catering staff were courteous and helpful'). The context of a company holiday party suggests that the experience was memorable and significant.
key_phrases: catering staff were courteous and helpful

Example_284.review: Salsa club moved next door, but restaurant closed on 08/15/2009. I always wanted to try this place, I'm sad to see it go....
Example_284.explanation: The reviewer expresses disappointment about not having the opportunity to try the restaurant before it closed, indicating a negative sentiment towards the missed experience rather than the restaurant's quality.
key_phrases: I'm sad to see it go
I always wanted to try this place

Example_285.review: The staff rocks (and they tell me the food is good, too). Forget your plans; you could wind up staying here all night.
Example_285.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the staff and has heard positive things about the food, suggesting a good overall experience. The suggestion to forget plans indicates a strong endorsement of the restaurant's atmosphere and the potential to enjoy a long visit.
key_phrases: they tell me the food is good, too
you could wind up staying here all night

Example_286.review: Went here on a weekday night. I didn't like it and I probably won't be back.
Example_286.explanation: The reviewer clearly states a negative experience with 'I didn't like it' and indicates a lack of intent to return, which suggests a strong negative sentiment.

Example_287.review: Hit and miss for lunch and summer. Was told that veggies were all fresh, no way..breakfast better. Homefries good. Omlettes dry and not so good.
Example_287.explanation: The reviewer has mixed feelings, noting both positive and negative aspects of their experience. The negative comments about the omelettes and the freshness of the veggies suggest dissatisfaction, while the positive note about the homefries and breakfast indicates some redeeming qualities.
key_phrases: Omlettes dry and not so good
veggies were all fresh, no way
Hit and miss for lunch and summer

Example_288.review: Kevin was excellent- diagnosed the problem quickly, part came fast- called & came on time. Very happy with service & would highly recommend.
Example_288.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the service provided, specifically mentioning the efficiency and reliability of the staff member, Kevin. They also indicate a strong endorsement of the service.

Example_289.review: Better than expected. Many salad bar items, excellent corn bread. BF cleared his plate, I did too. Nothing fancy but good food! Staff very attentive.
Example_289.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, with the food being better than they anticipated and specific praise for the corn bread and salad bar items. The mention of both the reviewer and their BF clearing their plates suggests satisfaction with the meal. The comment on the attentive staff adds to the positive experience.

Example_290.review: Great park for family fun. They even host music festivals there which is fantastic. Something for everyone for sure!
Example_290.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the park, mentioning it is great for family fun and highlighting the hosting of music festivals as a positive feature. The phrase 'something for everyone' suggests a broad appeal.
key_phrases: They even host music festivals there which is fantastic

Example_291.review: Awesome rides!!!!! Both children and adults rides were terrific! We went on a Friday and there were no lines! What more can you ask for?
Example_291.explanation: The use of multiple exclamation marks and the word 'awesome' indicate a very positive experience. The reviewer also positively notes that the rides were terrific for all ages and the lack of lines, which is a big plus for amusement parks.
key_phrases: Both children and adults rides were terrific

Example_292.review: Carowinds is a fun place.....where else can you spend $4 on a bottle of water?!
Example_292.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment by stating that Carowinds is a fun place, but follows it with a sarcastic remark about the high price of water, which indicates a negative aspect of their experience.
key_phrases: where else can you spend $4 on a bottle of water

Example_293.review: Worst customer service ever. The manager is rude and talks bad about the client and little care for his customer
Example_293.explanation: The review is focused on the negative aspects of customer service, with strong language indicating a very poor experience. The use of 'worst', 'rude', and 'talks bad' are clear indicators of dissatisfaction.

Example_294.review: it was ok. \n\nmussels were good. service ok. ambiance seemed dated. worth a trip, but not sure i would go back.
Example_294.explanation: The reviewer had a mixed experience. Positive remarks about the mussels suggest some satisfaction, while the service being 'ok' and the ambiance 'dated' indicate a lack of enthusiasm. The uncertainty about returning implies a lack of strong positive feelings.

Example_295.review: Thumbs up, great wine selection and atmosphere. Must try the Scallops. \nWent during Charlotte Restaurant Week. They accommodated a group of ten.
Example_295.explanation: The reviewer gives a positive endorsement ('Thumbs up') and compliments the wine selection and atmosphere, which are significant aspects of a dining experience. The recommendation to try the Scallops suggests a particularly enjoyable dish, and the ability to accommodate a large group is a positive aspect of service.

Example_296.review: Great setting. Big restaurant but great service. Mediterranean. Halibut was killer - in a soup. Major dipping action. A gem!
Example_296.explanation: The reviewer uses positive language such as 'great' for both the setting and service, and 'killer' in a positive sense to describe the halibut, indicating a very positive experience. The term 'a gem' suggests that the restaurant is outstanding.

Example_297.review: White tuna sushi was great! But the Pad Thai just ok. Next time i'll stick to the sushi
Example_297.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the white tuna sushi, which is a highlight of the review. However, they found the Pad Thai to be just average. The intention to return for the sushi indicates a generally positive experience.
key_phrases: But the Pad Thai just ok
Next time i'll stick to the sushi

Example_298.review: Quick, decent nothing amazing. the fried rice was good and egg drop soup decent. if you're looking just to crave a Chinese craving it works.
Example_298.explanation: The reviewer finds the service quick and the food decent, with a positive note on the fried rice. However, the use of 'nothing amazing' suggests that while the experience was satisfactory, it wasn't exceptional.

Example_299.review: Worst auto bell in town. Do not go here. It wasn't even decent enough for one star.
Example_299.explanation: The reviewer is expressing a strong negative opinion, suggesting that this is the worst location in town and advising others not to visit. The mention that it doesn't deserve even one star indicates a very low level of satisfaction.
key_phrases: wasn't even decent enough for one star

Example_300.review: I have only been once. Nice staff. Quality ingredients. Tasty and fresh cold cut subs. I had the Italian. Yum!
Example_300.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the food quality and taste, specifically mentioning the freshness and taste of the subs and the quality of the ingredients. The staff being nice adds to the positive experience.
key_phrases: Tasty and fresh cold cut subs
